analysis.key_quote: The proposed OPM rule dangerously undermines the merit-based civil service system by allowing career positions—allegedly still nonpartisan—to become effectively at-will.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the erosion of merit-based protections, the risk of politicization, and the potential loss of institutional knowledge, all of which align with a defense of the current civil service system.
